word:
Missionary Correspondence.--Women can do good work in the missionary field, by writing to friends, and learning their true feelings in relation to the cause of 
                                                                           148
God. Very valuable items are brought to light through this means. The workers should not seek for self-exaltation, but to present the truth in its simplicity wherever they shall have an opportunity.--Signs of the Times, Sept. 16, 1886.
